title: Topic 003 Question 049
body: You have a Linux container-based console application that uploads image files from customer sites all over the world. A back-end system that runs on Azure virtual machines processes the images by using the Azure Blobs API.
You are not permitted to make changes to the application.
Some customer sites only have phone-based internet connections.
You need to configure the console application to access the images.
options: Azure Storage Network File System (NFS) 3.0 support
